page.title: 16Scunthorpe.(South West.)
page.content: There is a large superstore complex on the edge of our block. We had a look around. Apart from the supermarket there are some smaller shops:- a pharmacy, furniture shop and a shoe shop. There is a tyre fitting bay and petrol station too. Behind the superstore is a residential caravan site with 106 caravans, 36 chalets and 25 huts. On the other side of the road is a modern pub called The Mallard. Beyond that is Scunthorpe Golf Course. Over the road from that is a new, private housing development where there are some very expensive houses and bungalows, most with double garages and beautiful, well-kept gardens. Some of the trees were not cut down so the houses are well shaded. Nearby there is Silica Lodge Lake which is quite deep. It is split almost into two by an island.
